title: Magic Hero with Zero Aptitude - Novel Updates
author: 風見鳩
description:
A hundred years had passed after the Hero had defeated the demon king.

Certain men and women have entered the Asuheruto Hero School Magic Department which was established in order to produce a hero.

The genius girl who was able to use the hero’s great ability ‘five-pointed star (Hertz)’, and the boy with zero magic aptitude who had no limits.

The people praised the genius girl, and despised the boy with zero aptitude.

—-without even noticing the tremendous hidden power hidden inside the boy.

This was a story where a certain boy and girl surpasses even the hero.>
